Item ID24219

The Swift blade is a one-handed weapon purchased from Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 350 Last Man Standing points.

Much like the Event rpg and Ham joint, it has no bonuses, but has an attack speed of 3.

Due to having no Attack level requirement, the Swift blade is the best-in-slot weapon for training Strength pures and Defence pures and combines well with the stab bonus given by the Ardougne cloaks.

This item is also commonly used by higher level players in the Theatre of Blood in the Nylocas room. Players previously used the Event rpg or the Ham joint here due to their 3 tick attack speeds. This item is very marginally better than the Ham joint as the stab attack style better utilises the attack bonuses of the gear commonly used for the Theatre.

[[File:Swift blade detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''Swift blade''' is a one-handed weapon purchased from [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 350 [[Last Man Standing]] points.

Much like the [[Event rpg]] and [[Ham joint]], it has no bonuses, but has an [[attack speed]] of 3.

Due to having no [[Attack]] level requirement, the Swift blade is the best-in-slot weapon for training [[Strength pure]]s and [[Defence pure]]s and combines well with the stab bonus given by the [[Ardougne cloak]]s.

This item is also commonly used by higher level players in the [[Theatre of Blood]] in the [[Nylocas]] room. Players previously used the Event rpg or the Ham joint here due to their 3 tick attack speeds. This item is very marginally better than the Ham joint as the stab attack style better utilises the attack bonuses of the gear commonly used for the Theatre.
